snippet.title: Blade Runner: Revelations VR Preview Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
Developed by Seismic Games and Alcon Media Group in conjunction with Google, Blade Runner: Revelations is out now on the Daydream Platform.  

Download it on the Google Play Store:  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.alconinteractive.brvr

About The Game:
Set shortly after the original film and in lead up to the narrative in the recently released and critically acclaimed Blade Runner 2049, users assume the role of a seasoned blade runner named “Harper" who unravels a twisted replicant plot that threatens the delicate balance of Los Angeles in 2023.  Players can smoothly navigate the world as the game also leverages WorldSense technology created by Google, which provides high definition PC-quality position tracking on a mobile device without the use of any additional external sensors.
